mapper.select: SELECT order_id, user_id, spot_id, start_time, end_time, order_status, note FROM tb_order ORDER BY start_time DESC, end_time DESC
SELECT order_id, user_id, spot_id, start_time, end_time, order_status, note FROM tb_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY start_time DESC, end_time DESC
SELECT order_id, user_id, spot_id, start_time, end_time, order_status, note FROM tb_order WHERE spot_id = #{spotId} ORDER BY start_time DESC, end_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order(user_id, spot_id, start_time, end_time, note) VALUES (#{userId}, #{spotId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{note})
